com.psddev.dari.db

Class SqlDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.db.AbstractDatabase<Connection>
      • com.psddev.dari.db.SqlDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Database, SettingsBackedObject

    public class SqlDatabase
extends AbstractDatabase<Connection>
    Database backed by a SQL engine.

      Builds an SQL statement that can be used to delete all rows matching the given query.

      • openConnection

        public Connection openConnection()
        Description copied from class: AbstractDatabase
        Opens an implementation-specific connection to the underlying database. Once opened, the connection should be closed with AbstractDatabase.closeConnection(C).
        Specified by:
        openConnection in class AbstractDatabase<Connection>
        Returns:
        Can't be null.

      • doOpenReadConnection

        protected Connection doOpenReadConnection()
        Description copied from class: AbstractDatabase
        Called when this database needs to open an implementation-specific connection to the underlying database that can only be used for reading data. The default implementation calls AbstractDatabase.openConnection().
        Overrides:
        doOpenReadConnection in class AbstractDatabase<Connection>
        Returns:
        Can't be null.
